src:
Microsoft Word, Excel dan PowerPoint di Ponsel Kini Menyatu
06 Nov 2019, 10:05 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: The Verge

Jakarta - Microsoft merilis aplikasi baru bernama Office di iOS dan Android. Aplikasi tersebut menyatukan Word, Excel dan PowerPoint.Ya selama ini kita harus mendownload aplikasi World, Excel dan PowerPoint secara terpisah. Dengan disatukan tentunya lebih ringkas karena semuanya menyatu dalam satu aplikasi. Terlebih lagi Microsoft memberikan sejumlah fitur pada aplikasi Office yang dapat membantu produktivitas. Seperti panel Action untuk membuat PDF dan berbagai file antar perangkat.Selain itu pengguna bisa memotret teks dan mengubahnya menjadi dokumen di Word atau tabel menjadi spreadsheet Excel. Semuanya bisa diedit lagi oleh pengguna.


Foto: microsoft

Kendati telah diumumkan, aplikasi Office belum dapat digunakan secara luas. Microsoft masih merilisnya sebagai public preview. Untuk pengguna Android harus mendaftarkan diri di sini. Sementara iOS harus menginstal TestFlight di sini.Nantinya setelah versifinalnya tersedia, aplikasi Office dapatdiunduh secara gratis di Play Store maupun App Store.Simak Video "Microsoft: 83% Perangkat Lunak di Indonesia Ilegal"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/afr)
text:
Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint on Mobile Now Combined
06 Nov 2019, 10:05 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: The Verge

Jakarta - Microsoft released a new application called Office on iOS and Android. The application unites Word, Excel and PowerPoint. Yes, so far we have to download the World, Excel and PowerPoint applications separately. Being put together is certainly more concise because they all come together in one application. Moreover, Microsoft provides a number of features in Office applications that can help productivity. Like the Action panel to create PDFs and various files between devices. In addition, users can take pictures of text and convert it into documents in Word or tables into Excel spreadsheets. Everything can be edited again by the user.


Photo: Microsoft

Although it has been announced, Office applications cannot be widely used yet. Microsoft is still releasing it as a public preview. Android users must register here. While iOS must install TestFlight here. Later after the version is available, Office applications can be downloaded for free on the Play Store and App Store. Watch Video "Microsoft: 83% Software in Indonesia is Illegal" [Gambas: Video 20second] (afr / afr)
